# Smart Contracts Cookbook

Welcome to the Polkadot Smart Contracts cookbook index.

This page contains a list of all relevant tutorials and guides to help you get started coding Smart Contracts and dApps in Polkadot.

|-------|:----------:|-------|-------------|
| [Faucet](/smart-contracts/faucet) | 游릭 Beginner | N/A | Learn how to obtain test tokens from Polkadot faucets for development and testing purposes across different networks. |

| Title | Difficulty | Tools | Description |
|-------|:----------:|-------|-------------|
| [Deploy an ERC-20 to Polkadot Hub](/smart-contracts/cookbook/smart-contracts/deploy-erc20) | 游릭 Beginner | EVM Wallet, Polkadot Remix IDE | Deploy an ERC-20 token on Polkadot Hub using PolkaVM. This guide covers contract creation, compilation, deployment, and interaction via Polkadot Remix IDE. |
| [Deploy an NFT to Polkadot Hub](/smart-contracts/cookbook/smart-contracts/deploy-nft) | 游릭 Beginner | EVM Wallet, Polkadot Remix IDE | Deploy an NFT on Polkadot Hub using PolkaVM and OpenZeppelin. Learn how to compile, deploy, and interact with your contract using Polkadot Remix IDE. |
